name: Release v3.2
body:
## Changelog

## ⚙️ Dependencies
- [1495655](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/1495655) Bump mockito-core from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1
- [5b2cbf5](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/5b2cbf5) Bump slf4j-simple from 1.7.32 to 1.7.35
- [e5b8915](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/e5b8915) Bump testng from 7.4.0 to 7.5
- [249fb71](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/249fb71) Bump assertj-core from 3.21.0 to 3.22.0
- [0aefe4c](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/0aefe4c) Bump jreleaser-maven-plugin from 0.9.1 to 0.10.0
- [42cfa40](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/42cfa40) Bump mockito-core from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0
- [364d8c6](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/364d8c6) Bump jcgay-build-configuration from 1.18 to 1.19
- [a28afee](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/a28afee) Bump asciitable-j7 from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1
- [f230954](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/f230954) Bump groovy from 3.0.8 to 3.0.9
- [ba387ea](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/ba387ea) Bump assertj-core from 3.20.2 to 3.21.0
- [1342ac3](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/1342ac3) Bump handlebars from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0
- [d94c5ff](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/d94c5ff) Bump mockito-core from 3.11.2 to 4.1.0
- [ef448ff](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/ef448ff) Bump jreleaser-maven-plugin from 0.6.0 to 0.9.1
- [1e000e9](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/1e000e9) Bump Maven from 3.8.2 to 3.8.4

---
- [fafb765](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/fafb765) Prepare release v3.2
- [b782f52](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/b782f52) Fix SonarQube badges
- [e75872c](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/e75872c) Restore sonarcloud analysis
- [6b98266](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/6b98266) Try to run coverage only when token is available
- [c60bd4e](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/c60bd4e) Setup Java 8 for CodeQL
- [1228021](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/1228021) Analyze code with CodeQL
- [c096a4f](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/c096a4f) Remove deprecated code
- [27c99b2](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/27c99b2) Set Locale when running test with Maven
- [d763fd7](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/d763fd7) Add console reporter (writes to the System.out)
- [c2be7eb](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/c2be7eb) Run coveralls only when token is present on CI
- [9d80c3a](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/9d80c3a) Hide user parameters in report
- [7d32ca4](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/7d32ca4) Remove jreleaser:release during release:perform


## Contributors
We'd like to thank the following people for their contributions:
Jean-Christophe Gay, Marouane Gazanayi, GitHub

name: Release v3.1.1
body:
## Changelog

- [4cf935a](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/4cf935a) Prepare release v3.1.1
- [99d3897](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/99d3897) Generate changelog with JReleaser
- [e17bf84](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/e17bf84) Report ITs in code coverage
- [61ff289](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/61ff289) Activate profiling with mvnd


## Contributors
We'd like to thank the following people for their contributions:
Jean-Christophe Gay

name: Release v3.1
body:
## Changelog

## ⚙️ Dependencies
- [5f0d462](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/5f0d462) Bump Maven from 3.6.1 to 3.8.2
- [d2e0511](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/d2e0511) Bump handlebars from 4.1.2 to 4.2.0
- [35b9807](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/35b9807) Bump maven-invoker-plugin from 3.2.1 to 3.2.2
- [3bb2f6e](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/3bb2f6e) Bump assertj-core from 3.14.0 to 3.20.2
- [0ef849c](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/0ef849c) Bump testng from 7.0.0 to 7.4.0
- [f2e53cd](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/f2e53cd) Bump mockito-core from 3.1.0 to 3.11.2
- [57b8b37](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/57b8b37) Bump slf4j-simple from 1.7.25 to 1.7.32
- [0a9c1c8](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/0a9c1c8) Bump groovy from 2.5.8 to 3.0.8
- [f4bc97a](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/f4bc97a) Bump takari-smart-builder from 0.4.0 to 0.6.1
- [733cdfe](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/733cdfe) Bump jcgay-build-configuration from 1.17 to 1.18

---
- [b66edde](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/b66edde) Prepare release v3.1
- [0859012](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/0859012) Generate changelog with JReleaser
- [1ec1b57](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/1ec1b57) Report ITs in code coverage
- [2ca2338](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/2ca2338) Activate profiling with mvnd
- [4d288f7](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/4d288f7) Fix running test on GitHub actions
- [944447c](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/944447c) Build with GitHub actions
- [33448f7](https://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commits/33448f7) Upgrade to GitHub-native Dependabot


## Contributors
We'd like to thank the following people for their contributions:
Jean-Christophe Gay

- Add a profile name to produced reports ([af77d28](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/af77d287f5681f888ca803e52edf907c6f069fc7)) by [@dmitry-timofeev](https://github.com/dmitry-timofeev)
- Migrate to Java 8 ([9dcb687](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/9dcb68756e9801bf0dc21f88c8413fc775a9ad09))

- Report global build time ([83fc997](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/83fc9974f0dfb0d464ad6f662304d6959f72561e))
- Log when profiler is active and report directory ([5e21c3a](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/5e21c3a529b928b4f98f0029fb65d8a12c5a45ad))
- Use event.getSession().getTopLevelProject() ([fbc8c7c](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/fbc8c7ce18b108ecc81ce9b6395c0f0a2df85d84)) by [@jakub-bochenski](https://github.com/jakub-bochenski)
- profileFormat can now take multiple, comma-separated formats ([d2ccdb9](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/d2ccdb9d7897b7735a0b57ed7a21ab54e4fc26cd)) by [@jakub-bochenski](https://github.com/jakub-bochenski)

Thanks @jakub-bochenski for the contributions.

- Can get times sorted by execution order ([03f28d7](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/03f28d70195767f90495370d4dc94d20a141f782)) by [@higuaro](https://github.com/higuaro)

Thanks @higuaro for the contribution.

- Minimize shaded JAR size [[view]](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/70d5605c95beb7604491ef67c3e55dd5827e1388)  
- Generate report in JSON [[view]](http://github.com/jcgay/maven-profiler/commit/f5b95067ee84af2b6934a76a98d30f0773d4cbf6) by [jasongardnerlv](https://github.com/jasongardnerlv)  

Thanks @jasongardnerlv for adding `JSON` report format.
